p.d: Alexis is Sainte-Adele's new mayor and the winds of change blow through the village. Séraphin discovers that his gold has been stolen and will do anything to find the thief. Siffleux commits a very serious act. Directed by: Sylvain Archambault (season 2, Canada, 2016) Screenplay: Gilles Desjardins, based on Claude-Henri Grignon Cast: Vincent Leclerc (Séraphin), Sarah-Jeanne Labrosse (Donalda), Maxime Le Flaguais (Alexis), Antoine Bertrand (Antoine Labelle), Rémi-Pierre Paquin (Bidou), Julie Le Breton (Délima), Anne-Élisabeth Bossé (Caroline), Madeleine Péloquin (Angélique), Marie-Éve Milot (Rosa-Rose), Roger Léger (Cyprien), André Kasper (Siffleux), Claude Despins (Jos), Alexis Lefebvre (Jérôme) Genre: drama
